verses.verse: מֹאזְנֵ֣י <S%H3976><s%> balance מִ֭רְמָה <S%H4820><s%> A false תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת <S%H8441><s%> [is] abomination יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD וְאֶ֖בֶן <S%H68><s%> weight שְׁלֵמָ֣ה <S%H8003><s%> but a just רְצוֹנֽוֹ׃ <S%H7522><s%> [is] his delight

בָּֽא־ <S%H935><s%> cometh זָ֭דוֹן <S%H2087><s%> [When] pride וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> then cometh קָל֑וֹן <S%H7036><s%> shame וְֽאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with צְנוּעִ֥ים <S%H6800><s%> but with the lowly חָכְמָֽה׃ <S%H2451><s%> [is] wisdom

תֻּמַּ֣ת <S%H8538><s%> The integrity יְשָׁרִ֣ים <S%H3477><s%> of the upright תַּנְחֵ֑ם <S%H5148><s%> shall guide וְסֶ֖לֶף <S%H5558><s%> them but the perverseness בּוֹגְדִ֣ים <S%H898><s%> of transgressors [וְשַׁדָּם כ] (יְשָׁדֵּֽם׃ <S%H7703><s%> dead ק)

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יוֹעִ֣יל <S%H3276><s%> profit ה֭וֹן <S%H1952><s%> Riches בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> not in the day עֶבְרָ֑ה <S%H5678><s%> of wrath וּ֝צְדָקָ֗ה <S%H6666><s%> but righteousness תַּצִּ֥יל <S%H5337><s%> delivereth מִמָּֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> from death

צִדְקַ֣ת <S%H6666><s%> The righteousness תָּ֭מִים <S%H8549><s%> of the perfect תְּיַשֵּׁ֣ר <S%H3474><s%> shall direct דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H1870><s%> his way וּ֝בְרִשְׁעָת֗וֹ <S%H7564><s%> by his own wickedness יִפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> shall fall רָשָֽׁע׃ <S%H7563><s%> but the wicked

צִדְקַ֣ת <S%H6666><s%> The righteousness יְ֭שָׁרִים <S%H3477><s%> of the upright תַּצִּילֵ֑ם <S%H5337><s%> shall deliver וּ֝בְהַוַּ֗ת <S%H1942><s%> in [their own] naughtiness בֹּגְדִ֥ים <S%H898><s%> them but transgressors יִלָּכֵֽדוּ׃ <S%H3920><s%> shall be taken

בְּמ֤וֹת <S%H4194><s%> dieth אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> man רָ֭שָׁע <S%H7563><s%> When a wicked תֹּאבַ֣ד <S%H6><s%> shall perish תִּקְוָ֑ה <S%H8615><s%> [his] expectation וְתוֹחֶ֖לֶת <S%H8431><s%> and the hope אוֹנִ֣ים <S%H205><s%> of unjust אָבָֽדָה׃ <S%H6><s%> [men] perisheth

צַ֭דִּיק <S%H6662><s%> The righteous מִצָּרָ֣ה <S%H6869><s%> of trouble נֶחֱלָ֑ץ <S%H2502><s%> is delivered out וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> cometh רָשָׁ֣ע <S%H7563><s%> and the wicked תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place

בְּפֶ֗ה <S%H6310><s%> with [his] mouth חָ֭נֵף <S%H2611><s%> An hypocrite יַשְׁחִ֣ת <S%H7843><s%> destroyeth רֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> his neighbour וּ֝בְדַ֗עַת <S%H1847><s%> but through knowledge צַדִּיקִ֥ים <S%H6662><s%> shall the just יֵחָלֵֽצוּ׃ <S%H2502><s%> be delivered

בְּט֣וּב <S%H2898><s%> When it goeth well צַ֭דִּיקִים <S%H6662><s%> with the righteous תַּעֲלֹ֣ץ <S%H5970><s%> rejoiceth קִרְיָ֑ה <S%H7151><s%> the city וּבַאֲבֹ֖ד <S%H6><s%> perish רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> and when the wicked רִנָּֽה׃ <S%H7440><s%> [there is] shouting

בְּבִרְכַּ֣ת <S%H1293><s%> By the blessing יְ֭שָׁרִים <S%H3477><s%> of the upright תָּר֣וּם <S%H7311><s%> is exalted קָ֑רֶת <S%H7176><s%> the city וּבְפִ֥י <S%H6310><s%> by the mouth רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked תֵּהָרֵֽס׃ <S%H2040><s%> but it is overthrown

בָּז־ <S%H936><s%> despiseth לְרֵעֵ֥הוּ <S%H7453><s%> his neighbour חֲסַר־ <S%H2638><s%> He that is void לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> of wisdom וְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> but a man תְּבוּנ֣וֹת <S%H8394><s%> of understanding יַחֲרִֽישׁ׃ <S%H2790><s%> holdeth his peace

הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> goes רָ֭כִיל <S%H7400><s%> A talebearer מְגַלֶּה־ <S%H1540><s%> revealeth סּ֑וֹד <S%H5475><s%> secrets וְנֶאֱמַן־ <S%H539><s%> but he that is of a faithful ר֝֗וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> spirit מְכַסֶּ֥ה <S%H3680><s%> concealeth דָבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> the matter

בְּאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there תַּ֭חְבֻּלוֹת <S%H8458><s%> Where no counsel יִפָּל־ <S%H5307><s%> fall עָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> [is] the people וּ֝תְשׁוּעָ֗ה <S%H8668><s%> [there is] safety בְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> but in the multitude יוֹעֵֽץ׃ <S%H3289><s%> of counsellors

רַע־ <S%H7451><s%> will surely יֵ֭רוֹעַ <S%H7489><s%> suffer כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָ֣רַב <S%H6148><s%> He that is surety זָ֑ר <S%H2114><s%> for a stranger וְשֹׂנֵ֖א <S%H8130><s%> [for it] and he that hateth תֹקְעִ֣ים <S%H8628><s%> suretiship בּוֹטֵֽחַ׃ <S%H982><s%> is sure

אֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> woman חֵ֭ן <S%H2580><s%> A gracious תִּתְמֹ֣ךְ <S%H8551><s%> retaineth כָּב֑וֹד <S%H3519><s%> honour וְ֝עָרִיצִ֗ים <S%H6184><s%> and strong יִתְמְכוּ־ <S%H8551><s%> [men] retain עֹֽשֶׁר׃ <S%H6239><s%> riches

גֹּמֵ֣ל <S%H1580><s%> doeth good נַ֭פְשׁוֹ <S%H5315><s%> to his own soul אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man חָ֑סֶד <S%H2617><s%> The merciful וְעֹכֵ֥ר <S%H5916><s%> troubleth שְׁ֝אֵר֗וֹ <S%H7607><s%> his own flesh אַכְזָרִֽי׃ <S%H394><s%> but [he that is] cruel

רָשָׁ֗ע <S%H7563><s%> The wicked עֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> worketh פְעֻלַּת־ <S%H6468><s%> work שָׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> a deceitful וְזֹרֵ֥עַ <S%H2232><s%> but to him that soweth צְ֝דָקָ֗ה <S%H6666><s%> righteousness שֶׂ֣כֶר <S%H7938><s%> reward אֱמֶֽת׃ <S%H571><s%> [shall be] a sure

כֵּן־ <S%H3651><s%> in צְדָקָ֥ה <S%H6666><s%> As righteousness לְחַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> [tendeth] to life וּמְרַדֵּ֖ף <S%H7291><s%> so he that pursueth רָעָ֣ה <S%H7451><s%> evil לְמוֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4194><s%> [pursueth it] to his own death

תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת <S%H8441><s%> [are] abomination יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD עִקְּשֵׁי־ <S%H6141><s%> They that are of a froward לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> heart וּ֝רְצוֹנ֗וֹ <S%H7522><s%> [are] his delight תְּמִ֣ימֵי <S%H8549><s%> but [such as are] upright דָֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> in [their] way

יָ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> [Though] hand לְ֭יָד <S%H3027><s%> [join] in hand לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יִנָּ֣קֶה <S%H5352><s%> shall not be unpunished רָּ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> the wicked וְזֶ֖רַע <S%H2233><s%> but the seed צַדִּיקִ֣ים <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous נִמְלָֽט׃ <S%H4422><s%> shall be delivered

נֶ֣זֶם <S%H5141><s%> [As] a jewel זָ֭הָב <S%H2091><s%> of gold בְּאַ֣ף <S%H639><s%> snout חֲזִ֑יר <S%H2386><s%> in a swine's אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> woman יָ֝פָ֗ה <S%H3303><s%> [so is] a fair וְסָ֣רַת <S%H5493><s%> which is without טָֽעַם׃ <S%H2940><s%> discretion

תַּאֲוַ֣ת <S%H8378><s%> The desire צַדִּיקִ֣ים <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> is only ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [is] only good תִּקְוַ֖ת <S%H8615><s%> [but] the expectation רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked עֶבְרָֽה׃ <S%H5678><s%> [is] wrath

יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> There is מְ֭פַזֵּר <S%H6340><s%> that scattereth וְנוֹסָ֥ף <S%H3254><s%> and yet increaseth ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> all וְחוֹשֵׂ֥ךְ <S%H2820><s%> and [there is] that withholdeth מִ֝יֹּ֗שֶׁר <S%H3476><s%> more than is meet אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> only לְמַחְסֽוֹר׃ <S%H4270><s%> but [it tendeth] to poverty

נֶֽפֶשׁ־ <S%H5315><s%> soul בְּרָכָ֥ה <S%H1293><s%> The liberal תְדֻשָּׁ֑ן <S%H1878><s%> shall be made fat וּ֝מַרְוֶ֗ה <S%H7301><s%> and he that watereth גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> will himself יוֹרֶֽא׃ <S%H3384><s%> shall be watered

מֹ֣נֵֽעַ <S%H4513><s%> He that withholdeth בָּ֭ר <S%H1250><s%> corn יִקְּבֻ֣הוּ <S%H5344><s%> shall curse לְא֑וֹם <S%H3816><s%> the people וּ֝בְרָכָ֗ה <S%H1293><s%> him but blessing לְרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> [shall be] upon the head מַשְׁבִּֽיר׃ <S%H7666><s%> of him that selleth

שֹׁ֣חֵֽר <S%H7836><s%> He that diligently seeketh ט֭וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good יְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <S%H1245><s%> procureth רָצ֑וֹן <S%H7522><s%> favour וְדֹרֵ֖שׁ <S%H1875><s%> but he that seeketh רָעָ֣ה <S%H7451><s%> mischief תְבוֹאֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H935><s%> it shall come

בּוֹטֵ֣חַ <S%H982><s%> He that trusteth בְּ֭עָשְׁרוֹ <S%H6239><s%> in his riches ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִפֹּ֑ל <S%H5307><s%> shall fall וְ֝כֶעָלֶ֗ה <S%H5929><s%> as a branch צַדִּיקִ֥ים <S%H6662><s%> but the righteous יִפְרָֽחוּ׃ <S%H6524><s%> shall flourish

עוֹכֵ֣ר <S%H5916><s%> He that troubleth בֵּ֭יתוֹ <S%H1004><s%> his own house יִנְחַל־ <S%H5157><s%> shall inherit ר֑וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the wind וְעֶ֥בֶד <S%H5650><s%> [shall be] servant אֱ֝וִ֗יל <S%H191><s%> and the fool לַחֲכַם־ <S%H2450><s%> to the wise לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> of heart

פְּֽרִי־ <S%H6529><s%> The fruit צַ֭דִּיק <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> [is] a tree חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> of life וְלֹקֵ֖חַ <S%H3947><s%> and he that winneth נְפָשׂ֣וֹת <S%H5315><s%> souls חָכָֽם׃ <S%H2450><s%> [is] wise

הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> If צַ֭דִּיק <S%H6662><s%> Behold the righteous בָּאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth יְשֻׁלָּ֑ם <S%H7999><s%> shall be recompensed אַ֝֗ף <S%H637><s%> How כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for רָשָׁ֥ע <S%H7563><s%> much more the wicked וְחוֹטֵֽא׃ <S%H2398><s%> and the sinner
